name: found-it
description: foundIt-Do you got any other's lost thing upload here Or if you lost something search here

scripts.both: concurrently "npx nodemon index.js" "cd foundit-frontend && npm run start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix foundit-frontend && npm run build --prefix foundit-frontend

author: Rishikant Patel
